turns.speaker: GEORGE
turns.text: If we don't hand you over, everybody in the sector'll be dead by morning.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: We don't have much choice then, do we?

turns.speaker: GEORGE
turns.text: Sit down.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Where's Kuato?

turns.speaker: GEORGE
turns.text: On his way.

turns.speaker: GEORGE
turns.text: You heard the rumors about the Pyramid Mine?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: GEORGE
turns.text: Cohaagen found something weird inside, and it's got him scared shitless.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: What, aliens?

turns.speaker: GEORGE
turns.text: You tell me.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I don't know.

turns.speaker: GEORGE
turns.text: Yes, you do.  That's why we brought you here.  --  Cohaagen's big secret is buried in that black hole you call a brain.  And Kuato's  gonna dig it out.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: You're Kuato, right?

turns.speaker: GEORGE
turns.text: Wrong.  Kuato's a mutant.  So don't get upset when you see him.

turns.speaker: GEORGE
turns.text: Shit!

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: C'mon!

turns.speaker: GEORGE
turns.text: They found us!  Everybody out!

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Melina!

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Hey Harry...Harry!  You ever heard of Rekall?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Rekall?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: They sell fake memories.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Oh, Rekall.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: "RekallRekallRekall."  You thinkin' of goin' there?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I don't know.  Maybe.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Well don't.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Why not?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: A friend of mine tried one of their "special offers"...Nearly got himself lobotomized.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: No shit...

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Don't fuck with your brain, pal.  It ain't worth it.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Hey, Quaid!

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Harry!

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: How was your trip to Mars?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: What trip?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: You went to Rekall, remember?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I did?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Yeah, you did.  I told you not to but you did anyway.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: What are you, my father?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Let me buy you a drink.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: No, Harry, I'm already late...See you tomorrow.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Harry, what the hell is this?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Come on, let's go have that drink.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: What the fuck did I do wrong?!  Tell me!

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: You blabbed, Quaid!  You blabbed about Mars!

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Are you crazy?!  I don't know anything about Mars.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: You shoulda listened to me, Quaid. I was there to keep you outta trouble.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Harry, you're making a big mistake! You've got me mixed up with somebody else!

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Unh-uh, pal.  You've got yourself mixed up with somebody else.

turns.speaker: RICHTER
turns.text: Where?

turns.speaker: HELM
turns.text: Up to the right.

turns.speaker: RICHTER
turns.text: I want that fucker dead.

turns.speaker: HELM
turns.text: I don't blame you man.  I wouldn't want Quaid porkin' my old lady.

turns.speaker: RICHTER
turns.text: Are you saying she liked it?

turns.speaker: HELM
turns.text: I'm sure she hated every fuckin' minute of it.

turns.speaker: RICHTER
turns.text: What was that?  I couldn't hear you.

turns.speaker: HELM
turns.text: I've got Quaid.

turns.speaker: RICHTER
turns.text: Where is he?

turns.speaker: HELM
turns.text: Level 2.  Galleria.

turns.speaker: RICHTER
turns.text: He shoulda killed Quaid back on Mars.

turns.speaker: RICHTER
turns.text: Shit!

turns.speaker: HELM
turns.text: What is it?

turns.speaker: HELM
turns.text: That son of a bitch got to be around here somewhere.

turns.speaker: RICHTER
turns.text: I've got him.  The guy in the turban.

turns.speaker: HELM
turns.text: I've got a weak signal over there.

turns.speaker: RICHTER
turns.text: Split up.  Find him.

turns.speaker: HELM
turns.text: He's not at ground level.

turns.speaker: RICHTER
turns.text: Up!

turns.speaker: HELM
turns.text: I've got a lock!  There!

turns.speaker: RICHTER
turns.text: Come on!

turns.speaker: HELM
turns.text: Look at this shit.

turns.speaker: RICHTER
turns.text: What the hell is this?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: I'm sorry.  Would you please rephrase the question.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: How did I get in this taxi?!

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: The door opened.  You got it.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Welcome to JohnnyCab.  Where can I...?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Drive!  DRIVE!!

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Would you please repeat the destination?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Anywhere!  Go!..Just go -- OH SHIT!! SHIT!!

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: The fare is eighteen credits, please.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Quit while you're ahead.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY
turns.text: Thanks for taking Johnnycab.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Is that better?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Mmmm.....

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Poor baby.  This is getting to be an obsession.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Who?

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: The brunette.  The one you told me about.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Lori, I don't believe it...You're jealous of a dream!

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Who is she?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Nobody.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Nobody?!  What's her name?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I don't know.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Tell me!

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: It's not funny, Doug.  You dream about her every night.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: But I'm always home by morning.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Let me go!

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Aw, come on, baby...You're the girl of my dreams.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: ...You mean it?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: You know I do.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Lori...

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Yeah, sweetheart?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Let's do it.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Do what?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Move to Mars.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Honey, do you have to spoil a perfectly wonderful morning.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Just think about it.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Sweetheart, we've been through this a million times.  You'd hate it on Mars. It's dry; it's ugly; it's boring!  --I mean, really, a revolution could break out there any minute.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Cohaagen says it's just a few extremists.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: And you believe him?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: All right, forget about it.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Doug, maybe we should take a trip.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Lori, move.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: There's lots nicer places than Mars.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Well...What do you say?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I'm late.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Sweetheart...I know it's hard being in a new town, but let's at least give it a chance here.  Okay?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Lori, don't you understand?  I feel I was meant for something more than this.  I want to do something with my life.--I want to be somebody.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: You are somebody.  You're the man I love.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Bye.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: What are you doing?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Some men just tried to kill me!

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Muggers?!  Doug, are you all right? What happened?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: No!  Spies or something.  And Harry from work...Get down!

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Harry from work...He was the boss.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Take it easy.  Tell me exactly what happened?  Why would "spies" want to kill you?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I don't know!  It had something to do with Mars.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Mars?  You've never even been to Mars.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I know it sounds crazy, but I went to this Rekall place after work, and...

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: You went to those brain butchers?!

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Let me finish!

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: What did they do to you?  Tell me!

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: --I got a trip to Mars.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Oh God, Doug.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Forget Rekall, will you!  These men were going to kill me...

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Doug, nobody tried to kill you.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: They did!  But I killed them!

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: You call this a paranoid delusion?!

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Doug...

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Not talk!  I said TALK!!

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: I'm not your wife.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: The hell you're not.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: I swear to God!...I never saw you before six weeks ago!  Our marriage is just a memory implant -- agghh!

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: You think I'm an idiot?  Remember our wedding?

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: It was implanted by the Agency.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: And falling in love?

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Implanted.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Our friends, my job, eight years together, I suppose all this was implanted too?

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: The job's real. -- But the Agency set it up.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Bullshit.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: O.K. then.  If I'm not me, then who the hell am I?

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Beats me.  I just work here.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: But Doug...There's something I want you to know.  You're the best assignment I ever hand.  Really.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I'm honored.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: You sure you don't wanna...?  For old time's sake.  If you don't trust me, you can tie me up.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I didn't know you were so kinky.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: It's time you found out.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Clever girl.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Doug...You wouldn't shoot me, would you?  After all we've been through?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Yeah.  Some of it was fun.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I suppose you're not here either.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: I'm here at Rekall.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: I love you.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Right.  That's why you tried to kill me.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Nooo!  I would never do anything to hurt you.  I want you to come back to me.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Bullshit.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Then I can pull this trigger, and it won't matter.

turns.speaker: LORI
turns.text: Doug, don't!

turns.speaker: MCCLANE
turns.text: Doug...Bob McClane.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Nice to meet you.

turns.speaker: MCCLANE
turns.text: Good to see ya. Right this way.

turns.speaker: MCCLANE
turns.text: Now help me out here, Doug.  You were interested in a memory of...

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Mars.

turns.speaker: MCCLANE
turns.text: Right.  Mars.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: That a problem?

turns.speaker: MCCLANE
turns.text: To be perfectly honest with you, Doug, if outer space is your thing, I think you'd be much happier  with one of our Saturn cruises.Everybody raves about 'em.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I'm not interested in Saturn.  I said Mars.

turns.speaker: MCCLANE
turns.text: Okay, you're the boss -- Mars it is.

turns.speaker: MCCLANE
turns.text: Let's see...the basic Mars package will run you just eight hundred and ninety-nine credits.  That's for two full weeks of memories, complete in every detail.  --A longer trip'll run you a little more, cause you need a deeper implant.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: What's in the two week package?

turns.speaker: MCCLANE
turns.text: First of all, Doug, when you go Rekall, you get nothing but first class memories: private cabin on the shuttle; deluxe suite at the Hilton; plus all the major sights:  Mount Pyramid, the Grand Canals, and of course...  Venusville.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: How real does it seem?

turns.speaker: MCCLANE
turns.text: As real as any memory in your head.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Come on, don't bullshit me.

turns.speaker: MCCLANE
turns.text: I'm telling you, Doug, your brain won't know the difference.  Guaranteed, or your money back.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: What about the guy you lobotomized...Did he get a refund?

turns.speaker: MCCLANE
turns.text: You're talking ancient history, Doug. Nowadays, traveling with Rekall is safer than getting on a rocket.  Look at the statistics.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: All right.

turns.speaker: MCCLANE
turns.text: Smart move.  Now while you fill out the questionnaire, I'll familiarize you with some of our options.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: No options.

turns.speaker: MCCLANE
turns.text: Whatever you say...Just answer one question.  What is it that is exactly the same about every vacation you've ever taken?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I give up.

turns.speaker: MCCLANE
turns.text: You.  You're the same.  No matter where you go, there you are. Always the same old you.  Let me suggest that you take a vacation from yourself.  I know it sounds wild, but it's the latest thing in travel. We call it an "Ego Trip".

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I'm not interested in that.

turns.speaker: MCCLANE
turns.text: You're gonna love this. --We offer you a choice of alternate identities during your trip.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Secret agent...How much is that?

turns.speaker: MCCLANE
turns.text: Aaah, let me tantalize you.  You're a top operative, back under deep cover on your most important mission.  People are trying to kill you left and right. You meet a beautiful, exotic woman...

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Go on.

turns.speaker: MCCLANE
turns.text: I don't wanna spoil it for you, Doug. Just rest assured, by the time the trip is over, you get the girl, you kill the bad guys, and you save the entire planet.  Now you tell me.  Is that worth three hundred measly credits?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: They'll be here any minute!  They'll kill you all!

turns.speaker: MCCLANE
turns.text: What's he talking about?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Let me go!

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I love you.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: I love you.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: Ooo, whatcha been feeding that thing?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Blondes.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: I think it's still hungry.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: I thought Cohaagen tortured you to death!

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I guess he didn't.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: You couldn't get me a message?  You never wondered what happened to me?

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: ...What?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: There's something I have to tell you...

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I don't remember you.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: What are you talking about?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I don't remember you.  I don't remember us.  I don't even remember me.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: What, did you get amnesia?...How'd you get here?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Hauser left me a note.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: Hauser?  You're Hauser.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Not any more.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: Hauser, you're lost your mind.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I didn't lose it.  Cohaagen stole it. He found out that Hauser switched sides,-so he turned him into somebody else.  Me.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: This is too weird.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Then he dumped me on Earth with a wife and a lousy job and ...

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: Wait, did you say wife?...Are you fuckin' married!!?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: She wasn't really my wife.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: Oh, she isn't really your wife.  How stupid of me...She was Hauser's wife.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Forget I said wife.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: No. Let's forget everything!  I've had it with you and your goddamn lies.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Why would I lie to you?

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: Because you're still working for Cohaagen.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Don't be ridiculous.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: You never loved me, Hauser!  You just used me to get inside.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Inside what?

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: I think you better leave.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Melina, Hauser sent me to do something.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: I'm not falling for it.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: He said there's enough in here to nail Cohaagen for good.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: Get out!

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: I said get out!

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Melina, please...People are trying to kill me.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I thought you didn't like me.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: If Cohaagen wants you dead, you might be okay.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: So you dropped by to apologize?

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: Kuato wants to see you.  Come on!

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Now what?

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: Jump!

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: By the way...ever heard of a company names Rekall?

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: I used to model for 'em, why?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Just wondering.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Not bad, for a hooker.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: I'm not a hooker!  That's my cover.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: The first settlers are buried here. They worked themselves to death, but Cohaagen ended up with all the money. He built cheap domes and watched their kids turn into freaks.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I saw them.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: What can I do?

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: Kuato's gonna make you remember a few things you knew when you were Hauser.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Like what?

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: All sorts of things.  You might even remember you loved me.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I don't need Kuato for that.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: Oh, since when?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: He's lying.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: You two-faced-bastard.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Are you all right?  Are you still you?

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: I'm not sure dear?  What do you think?

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: Where are you going?!

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: The reactor.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: What reactor?!

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: The one in the mine!

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: People are dying, Quaid!!  Stop!!  We've got to get air!!

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: Where's this "reactor" come from?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Aliens built it.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: Aliens?!

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: You sure about this?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: It's just up ahead.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Cohaagen knows it makes air.  But the bastard won't turn it on.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: Of course not.  If Mars had an atmosphere, he's lose control.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: The whole core of Mars is ice.  The reactor melts it and releases oxygen.

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: Enough for everybody to breathe?

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: What's wrong?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I just has a terrible thought...What is this is all a dream?

turns.speaker: MELINA
turns.text: Then kiss me quick...before you wake up.

turns.speaker: STEVENS
turns.text: This is the suitcase you gave me.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: I gave you?

turns.speaker: STEVENS
turns.text: I'm leaving it here.  Come get it and keep moving.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: Wait!

turns.speaker: STEVENS
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: ...Who are you?

turns.speaker: STEVENS
turns.text: We were buddies in the Agency back on Mars.  You asked me to find you if you disappeared.  So here I am, good-bye.

turns.speaker: QUAID
turns.text: What was I doing on Mars?!  Damn!

turns.speaker: EARL
turns.text: Rhonda.  Rhonda LeBeck.  She's getting some kind of strange readings on her things.

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: Damn, you know, those kids turn up oil or uranium or something out there...next thing the Feds will be at our door.  "Sorry, time to move. Eminent domain."

turns.speaker: EARL
turns.text: Or a big mother slug maybe?

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: Some kind of mutation...?

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: You guys all set?

turns.speaker: EARL
turns.text: Ready as we'll ever be.

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: Heather and I are going to drive around a little, see if we can find that college girl and tell her to get her ass back into town.

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: You stupid punk!  You came <u>that</u> close, <u>that</u> close!!

turns.speaker: EARL
turns.text: One of these days, Melvin, somebody's gonna kick your ass.

turns.speaker: EARL
turns.text: Okay, Burt, listen.  Forget shooting them.  Tell me this: can you get to your truck?

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: No problem.

turns.speaker: EARL
turns.text: Good.  You've got the only truck in the valley that can make it up that damn jeep trail.  So, here's the plan: You and Heather go for help. Get to the mountains...

turns.speaker: EARL
turns.text: Yeah, like they got a plan...

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: Breaker there, Earl.  What do you want us to do?

turns.speaker: EARL
turns.text: Hang on, Burt.  The bastards are up to something.

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: Yeah, still got one poking around.

turns.speaker: EARL
turns.text: That's four.  Let us know if it starts moving, Burt.

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: Roger that.

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: What?  Well, for chrissake, we could have made a stand at our place!  We had food, water...

turns.speaker: EARL
turns.text: You can't fight'em that way...

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: You two jackasses hauled us way the hell out here...!?

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: How much you think?

turns.speaker: EARL
turns.text: I don't know...  They're pretty quick...fifteen seconds?

turns.speaker: EARL
turns.text: What the hell is that, anyway?

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: Cannon fuse.

turns.speaker: EARL
turns.text: What do <u>you</u> use it for?

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: My cannon.

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: Miguel, the trouble's come to us. If we're not ready...

turns.speaker: HEATHER
turns.text: Phone's out.  Road's out.  We're on our own.

turns.speaker: HEATHER
turns.text: I can't believe it.  No tracks, no sign, no spoor.

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: Yeah, whatever they are, you'd think after they ate all those sheep they'd have to take a dump someplace...  What the hell's going on in town?

turns.speaker: HEATHER
turns.text: You're not getting any penetration, even with the elephant gun.

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: Damn!  Val, we can't get them.  Never figured on having to shoot through dirt!  Best goddamn bullet stop there is.  Come back.

turns.speaker: HEATHER
turns.text: Knock it off, Burt!

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: I think I scared it!

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: What do you think?  Max firepower or...?

turns.speaker: HEATHER
turns.text: I'd go for penetration.  The 458 shooting solids -- less ammo to carry anyway.

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: A beauty, isn't it?  We bought three of them for the rec room.

turns.speaker: VAL
turns.text: We sell 'em to you for three bucks a piece!

turns.speaker: BURT
turns.text: What the hell you doing back already?

turns.speaker: VAL
turns.text: You're never going to believe this, but the canyon road...we were on it not two hours ago...well, it's completely...
